entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -41.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 06:50 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Temperature: -41.3°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -45.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
